meanings.definition: Not reminiscent or suggestive of something else.
meanings.sent1: The new painting was unreminiscent of any style I had seen before.
meanings.sent2: The plain white walls were unreminiscent of the colorful murals in the city.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at singing was unreminiscent of any known melody.
meanings.sent4: The taste of the exotic fruit was unreminiscent of anything I had ever tried before.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious sound in the forest was unreminiscent of any animal I knew.

meanings.definition: Failing to bring to mind or recall something.
meanings.sent1: Her unreminiscent expression made it hard to remember where we had met before.
meanings.sent2: The unreminiscent scent in the air left me unable to remember the bakery's location.
meanings.sent3: The unreminiscent dream slipped from her memory as soon as she woke up.
meanings.sent4: The unreminiscent name on the list puzzled me as I couldn't recall who it belonged to.
meanings.sent5: The unreminiscent voice on the phone left me struggling to place the caller.
